instructions: Tap the event, tap Edit, tap Invitees, then tap Add Invitees. Or, if you didn t schedule the event, tap it, tap Invitees, then tap the Send Mail to Invitees button . Type the names or email addresses of invitees, or tap the Add button to select Contacts. Tap Done (or tap Send if you didn t schedule the event).
To respond to an event notification, tap it. Or, in Calendar, tap Inbox, then tap an invitation. Tap your response Accept, Maybe, or Decline.
Tap the event, then tap Edit. Tap Show As, then tap Free.
Tap the meeting, then tap Propose New Time. Tap the time, then enter a new one.
Tap an event that has attendees. Tap Invitees, then tap the Send Mail to Invitees button .
